title: WCD Sri Sathya Sai Recruitment 2025 - Apply Offline for 10 Educator, Ayah Posts
description: The Women and Child Development Sri Sathya Sai District (WCD Sri Sathya Sai District) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 10 Cook, Helper & Night Watchman, Educator, Art & Craft & Music Teacher, Doctor, and Ayah Jobs. Interested and eligibile candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their 10th pass, 08th, Diploma, MBBS, Any Degree, and Post-graduation can apply for the WCD Sri ...
